text: Pope Benedict may mean: *Pope Benedict I (575–579) *Pope Benedict II (684–685) *Pope Benedict III (855–858) *Pope Benedict IV (900–903) *Pope Benedict V (964) *Pope Benedict VI (972–974) *Pope Benedict VII (974–983) *Pope Benedict VIII (1012–1024) *Pope Benedict IX (1032–1044, 1045–1046 & 1047–1048) *:Antipope Benedict X *Pope Benedict XI (1303–1304) *Pope Benedict XII (1334–1342) *Pope Benedict XIII (1724–1730) *:Antipope Benedict XIII *Pope Benedict XIV (1740–1758) *:Antipope Benedict XIV *Pope Benedict XV (1914–1922) *Pope Benedict XVI (2005–2013) Benedict
title: Pope Benedict
